name: 50 50: Addictive Shape Cutting
description:
Split a shape in half and try to get 50% shapes!

There are hundreds of interesting silhouettes: Countries, animals, foods...

Two different modes to increase fun! Timed mode and Master mode…

Show your perfection! Collect all the stars and diamonds. Explore new slicing adventures!

It's more challenging and addictive than you think.

Slice them all! Have fun!
